exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap k : dim x : dart i : nat z : dart H1 : inv_hmap m H2 : (fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end) m k x <> nil Unable to unify "(fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end) (fun z : dart => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z)) i z" with "(fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end) (fun z : dart => cA_1 (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x)) one (cA_1 (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x)) zero z)) i z".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in Iter (cF (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))) i z = Iter (cF m) i z

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
dart = nat : Set
MA0.f_1_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA0.f_1 m (Iter (MA0.f m) (S i) z) = Iter (MA0.f m) i z
MF.period_lub : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MF.Iter_upb m z in (0 < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MF.f m) nr z = z /\ (forall i : nat, (0 < i < nr)%nat -> Iter (MF.f m) i z <> z)
A_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A m j z
MF.Iter_plus : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MF.f m) (p + i) z = Iter (MF.f m) i z -> Iter (MF.f m) p z = z
F_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in F (L (B m k x) k x y) z = F m z
cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cF (L (B m k x) k x y) z = cF m z
exd_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in exd (L (B m k x) k x y) z < -> exd m z
A_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A_1 m j z
cA_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA m j z
cA_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA_1 m j z
MF.Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := MF.Iter_upb m z in Iter (MF.f m) nr z = z
inv_hmap_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> inv_hmap (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))
MF.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MF.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MF.diff_int = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) => forall i j : nat, (a <= i)%nat /\ (i < j <= b)%nat -> Iter (MF.f m) i z <> Iter (MF.f m) j z : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope]
cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
cA_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z
cA_cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
cA_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z)
A_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A m k x -> A_1 (B m k x) k y = A_1 m k y
A_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), y <> x -> A (B m k x) k y = A m k y
eqc_Iter_cF : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> eqc m z (Iter (cF m) n z)
exd_Iter_cF : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (cF m) n z)
A_1_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z
cA_cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z) /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
A_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A (B m k x) k x = nil
top_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (A m k z) = top m k z
bottom_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> bottom m k (A m k z) = bottom m k z
A_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A_1 (B m k x) k (A m k x) = nil
A_B_1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A_1 m k x -> A (B_1 m k x) k y = A m k y
succ_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> bottom m k x <> A m k x
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
A_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x y : dart), k <> j -> A (B m k x) j y = A m j y
A_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> A m k (A_1 m k z) = z
eqc_eqc_cF : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cF m y)
not_succ_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k z -> B m k z = m
inversion_planarity : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> planar (L m k x y) -> planar m
top_top_2 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z

``` 
intros m k x i z H1 H2.
unfold succ in H2.
unfold A in H2.
unfold cF.
unfold Iter.
rewrite H2. 
reflexivity.
```
